description.en: Everything is connected. To understand this, the course will start with a motivational lecture, by enlisting applications and examples of social network analysis from the real world. Next, basic and fundamental concepts will be introduced. To understand the social structure various statistical measures will be introduced. We will also go through various micro concepts, for example, how to identify important nodes in the network. In addition, meso concepts such as communities will be discussed to explore how a group of individuals can be identified in a large network. We will also investigate macro measures to understand the overall structure of a network. Course will also discuss concepts like link prediction, timely and important topics like hate speech and misinformation on online social media platforms.

objectives.en: The objective of this course is to introduce concepts of network science using hands-on exercises. To be specific, the students will learn how relationships among various entities (for example people) can be analysed and interpreted through methods of social network analysis. Students will be introduced to how social network analysis borrows ideas from Mathematics (Graph Theory), Social Sciences (Sociology, Economics), Natural Sciences and Engineering (Physics and Computer Science) to solve problems in different domains. In addition, advanced neural networks based techniques such as Graph Neural Networks will also be introduced. For hands on session, Python and Gephi will be used, for manipulating, analyzing, and visualizing the  network data.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvustada võrgustike analüüsi põhimõtteid kasutades praktilisi harjutusi. Tudengid õpivad, kuidas analüüsida ja tõlgendada erinevate osapoolte (näiteks inimesed) vahelisi seoseid sotsiaalvõrgustikes. Kursusel näidatakse, kuida sotsiaalvõrgustike analüüs kasutab matemaatilka (graafiteooria), sotsiaalteaduste (sotsioloogia, majanadus) ja loodusteaduste ning inseneerika (füüsika, arvutiteadus) teooriad probleemide lahendamiseks erinevates valdkondades. Lisaks tutvustatakse tudengitele ka keerukamaid tehisnärvivõrkude tehnikaid. Praktikumides kasutatakse andmete analüüsimiseks, modelleerimiseks ja visualiseerimiseks tööriistu nagu Python, Gephi.

learning_outcomes.en: After attending this course, the learner
will be able to conceptualize their own social network study;
will know how to collect data from offline and online social networks;
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab koguda andmeid on-line ja off-line võrgustikes;

learning_outcomes.en: can use this data for further use for analysing the data.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab kogutud andmeid kasutada edasises analüüsis;

learning_outcomes.en: will be able to perform a research study using social network analysis theories and using tools such as Gephi and R/Python
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab viia läbi sotsiaalvõrgustike uuringut tuginedes võrgustike analüüsi teooriatele ja kasutades tööriistu nagu Gephi, R ja Python.

The whole grade of the course comes from one course project (100 points).
The resulting grade (out of 100) will be mapped to a grade between A and F using the standard University scale.
